title: STARTUPS
description: Evolve 2023 brought together 5,000 startup founders and operators, accompanied by 3,000 investors, representing $3 trillion in assets under management.

accpara.accparalist: Slush 100 — the most coveted startup competition in the world.
World-class funds Accel, General Catalyst, Lightspeed Venture Partners, NEA, and Northzone came together to invest €1,000,000 in the best early-stage startup at Slush 2023.
Stay tuned for Slush 100 this year and find out more about the competition from the link below.
Founders Day is the largest founder-only gathering in the world.
In 2023, we built Founders Day even bigger to include mentoring, workshops, speakers, and experiences.
Stay tuned for the 2024 edition of Founders Day.

Startup Studio showcases 80 ambitious companies from deep tech, AI/ML, space tech, and other thrilling sectors. The stage also shows the world who Slush thinks deserves more visibility in the Nordics and Emerging Ecosystems.
Applications for 2024 will open later in the year.
Do you want to have your own booth at the heart of the Slush venue?
It’s the most concrete way to get traction, leads, and general visibility for early-stage startups and their products.
Contact startups@slush.org to find out more.

When was the last time you dipped in the icy sea or slid through the Finnish archipelago? Maybe you’re looking for an activity to network with founder peers? We’ve got experiences for the adrenaline junkies and those that want to relax before kickstarting their time at Slush.
Information on 2024 Experience Events coming later.
If you’re looking for media coverage, this is for you.
Media Bank is a source bank for journalists, gathering all announcements happening during Slush week so none are lost in the Slush noise.

Speaker Q&As are 45-minute Q&A sessions taking place during Slush. 30 Startup Pass holders per session get to pick the brains of expert operators and founders after a Builder Stage talk. Whether it’s Airbnb, Deel, or Doordash operators, you’ll have a chance to ask them for advice on your problems to accelerate your growth.
More information on 2024 Speaker Q&As coming later.
In 2022 we had:
16,500 meetings: 37% of all meetings held between startups and investors.
40% of investors invest across Europe and North America.
